best_gem_comment: This class is an incredible introduction to sociology, especially if you are already set on concentrating. I felt like I learned so much and will enter each interaction from now on with a new level of empathy. A gem! TAKE THIS COURSE :)
I would tell students this class is a gem and be prepared to participate during lecture and be creative in your writing responses!
best_gem_comment_short: I would tell students this class is a gem and be prepared to participate during lecture and be creative in your writing responses!
